titleStmt.title: The agreement of the associated ministers of the county of Essex: proposed to their particular congregations, and to all such of the county that love the churches peace; with a word of exhortation to brotherly union.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and much amended.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Brewster, at the Crane in Pauls-Church Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
